name: IC3PEAK
description: '''IC3PEAK''' is a Russian [[electronic music]] duo that was founded in 2013. It consists of Anastasia Kreslina and Nikolay Kostilev. They are characterized by the [[Music and politics|political]] undertones in their music, particularly [[Opposition to Vladimir Putin in Russia|criticizing]] the [[Russian government]]. Their political views and lyrics have led to [[Censorship in Russia|censorship]] of their music in 2019. Their effects in mainstream media led to outpouring support throughout the [[Western world|West]], and in Russia.
